SEARCH
Package photos.controller

Class OptionsController

java.lang.Object
photos.controller.OptionsController
public class OptionsController extends Object
Controller for the photo options view, or Options.fxml. This controller provides functionality to add/remove captions and tags, view a photo in a fuller, separate display, and copy or transfer/move a photo to another album.
Author:
Chloe Wolohan

    • makeNewTag

      javafx.scene.control.Button makeNewTag
      Button that dynamically adds a Button to tagTypeBox that, when clicked on, fills in the prefix of the newTag text field. Only allows one tag

    • move

      javafx.scene.control.Button move
      Button that loads in Destination.fxml

    • quitButton

      javafx.scene.control.Button quitButton
      Button that saves user data and quits application.

    • restricted

      javafx.scene.control.Button restricted
      Button that dynamically adds a Button to tagTypeBox that, when clicked on, fills in the prefix of the newTag text field. Allows any number of tags.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the tag type buttons dynamically based on the user's available tag types. Called automatically when the scene is loaded.

    • insertRestrictedTag

      public void insertRestrictedTag(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This is what the user does after pressing the button only allowing for one tag of the certain tag type.
      Parameters:
      e - the triggering event from the makeNewTag button

    • insertUnrestrictedTag

      public void insertUnrestrictedTag(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This is what the user does after pressing the button allowing for any number tags of the certain tag type.
      Parameters:
      e - the triggering event from the restricted button
